      • share

        void share(Activity context,
         SocializeSession session,
         SocializeAction action,
         String comment,
         Location location,
         ShareType destination,
         SocialNetworkListener listener)
        Shares the given action to the given social network.
        Parameters:
        context - The current context.
        session - The current user session.
        comment - The comment provided by the user.
        location - The location of the user (may be null).
        destination - The network on which to post the share.
        listener - A listener to handle callbacks from the post.
